trigger.name: Ethereum Hash Power Low
trigger.description: Total ethereum hash rate has dropped below allowed low of 230 and is {ITEM.VALUE1}

trigger.expression: {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[0].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[1].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[2].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[3].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[4].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[5].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[6].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[7].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[8].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[9].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[10].min(#10)}<90 or {Mining Rigs:gpu.power.draw[11].min(#10)}<90
trigger.name: GPU Power Draw Low
trigger.description: A GPU was detected to have a power draw of 90 or less.
